OOC: If you don't get the "hazy shade of winter" reference don't feel bad but 
don't ask.

::Firaxis::
       "Well for one thing, you're looking at the clock not the range-finder. 
 That is over here."  He gestures at another console.  He looks out the front 
viewport.  "And since I can see the polar region in front of us I'd say we're 
about there."  He sets the ship down on the ice sheet and opens the hatch.  
He gets up and wanders outside.  "But look around, leaves are brown, it's a 
hazy shade of winter.  Uh ... well technically there aren't any leaves but 
that's okay.  We have arrived."

--part1_8b.1a867365.2a5920f6_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
